data.name: SQLContext
desc: provides special information about the context where a com.sun.star.sdbc.SQLException occurred.
As usual for SQLExceptions, several SQLContext-objects may be chained, then the most recent context is appended to the list's tail.

properties.name: Details
desc: provides special info about the details where a com.sun.star.sdbc.SQLException occurred.
As usual for SQLExceptions, several SQLContext-objects may be chained, then the most recent context is appended to the list's tail
